Articles.Content:
I'm in the middle of making my own mod so I cant really do this right now.... but I want a launch clamps pack that add, well launch clamps based on real ones (SLS,the new CST-100) if some one could do this it would be great....

![news-022015e-lg.jpg](http://www.collectspace.com/images/news-022015e-lg.jpg)

![sls_in_vab.jpg?itok=5OL1m9QO](http://www.nasa.gov/sites/default/files/styles/226xvariable_height/public/sls_in_vab.jpg?itok=5OL1m9QO)
I'm pretty sure FASA has some nice launch clamps.

> 
> I'm pretty sure FASA has some nice launch clamps.

FASA has wonderful clamps... I just want the ones that are in the pictures.... I would make them but don't know how...

-----------------------------UPDATE-----------------------------

I'm learning how to make Launch clamps... Please lock this thread

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T01:04:29Z" title="08/14/2015 01:04  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by Tristonwilson12**
Those aren't launch clamps. The bottom one as far as I can tell is just a tower without clamps (it's a mock up). The top one is a skybridge for people, not a clamp.
